00072

00085                               const sc_fxcast_switch& );

00091

00120 inline
00121 sc_fxcast_switch::sc_fxcast_switch() 
00122 : m_sw()
00123 {
00124     *this = sc_fxcast_context::default_value();
00125 }
00126 
00127 inline
00128 sc_fxcast_switch::sc_fxcast_switch( sc_switch sw_ )
00129 : m_sw( sw_ )
00130 {}
00131

00134 : m_sw( a.m_sw )
00135 {}
00136

00139 : m_sw( SC_DEFAULT_CAST_SWITCH_ )

00143 inline
00144 sc_fxcast_switch&
00145 sc_fxcast_switch::operator = ( const sc_fxcast_switch& a )
00146 {
00147     if( &a != this )
00148     {
00149         m_sw = a.m_sw;
00150     }
00151     return *this;
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 inline
00156 bool
00157 operator == ( const sc_fxcast_switch& a, const sc_fxcast_switch& b )
00158 {
00159     return ( a.m_sw == b.m_sw );
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00163 inline
00164 bool
00165 operator != ( const sc_fxcast_switch& a, const sc_fxcast_switch& b )
00166 {
00167     return ( a.m_sw != b.m_sw );
00168 }
00169

00174 {
00175     a.print( os );
